text: Hi Briony, lovely to hear from you, was concerned that something wasn't right. All well at my end busy with presentations and preparation for headquarter reporting. How did the mock exams go? Were you stressed or felt ok? How can I help you - what questions/concerns fly around in your head I might be able to help you with?
The exams were good. Through the results, I think my teachers have predicted A, A, B for my reference to universities.

The main question I had was, can Iapply for a finance or management or economics course with an accounting personal statement. So, I have accounting personal statement but for various universities I am applying for various courses which are actually very closely related to each other.
So, Can I use this personal statement on accounting for all management or finance or economic course??
